editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by Hill Museum & Manuscript Library.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This XML file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msItem.title: Homily on John the Baptist by "the Orthodox"
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘርቱዐ፡ ሃይማኖት፡ ዘደረሰ፡ በእንተ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ መጥምቅ፡

msItem.title: Anonymous homily for St. John's Day
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ በጸሎተ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ መጥምቅ፡
msItem.note: On f. 9r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በተከዜ.

msItem.title: Homily for the feast of the Holy Cross by the bishop Minās
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘሚናስ፡ ጳጳስ፡ ነገር፡ በእንተ፡ ክቡር፡ መስቀል፡
msItem.note: On f. 10r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በበዓለ፡ መስቀል፡.

msItem.title: Homily for the feast of the Holy Cross by James of Sarug
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘብፁዕ፡ ወቅዱስ፡ አባ፡ ያዕቆብ፡ ኤጲስ፡ ቆጶስ፡ ዘስሩግ፡ በእንተ፡ መስቀል።
msItem.note: On f. 14r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በመስቀል፡.

msItem.title: The story of the appearance of the Holy Cross to emperor Constantine
msItem.incipit: አርአያ፡ መስቀል፡ ዘአስተርአዮ፡ ለቈስጠንጢኖስ፡ ወበዘ፡ ረከበት፡ እሌኒ፡ ዕፀ፡ መስቀል፡ በሳብዕ፡ ዓመተ፡ መንግሥቱ፡ ለቈስጠንጢኖስ፡ ንጉሥ።
msItem.note: On f. 15v in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በእሌኒ፡.

msItem.title: The story of the finding of the Holy Cross, for the feast of St. Helena
msItem.incipit: ወኮነ፡ በመዋዕለ፡ ቈስጠንጢኖስ፡ ዐቢይ፡ ንጉሥ፡ ብእሲ፡ ፈራሄ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ወእሙኒ፡ ንግሥት፡ ፈራሂተ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ይእቲ፡ እሌኒ፡ ስማ።
msItem.note: On f. 23r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በእሌኒ፡.

msItem.title: Homily for the feast of the 70 Disciples and the 318 Orthodox Fathers of Nicea by Minās, bishop of Axum
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘብፁዕ፡ ወቅዱስ፡ ኤጲስ፡ ቆጶስ፡ ሚናስ፡ ዘአክሱም፡ በእንተ፡ ሰብዓ፡ አርድእት፡ ወበእንተ፡ ቅዱሳን፡ አበው፡ እለ፡ በኒቅያ፡ ተጋብኡ፡ ፫፻፡ ፲ወ፰፡ ጳጳሳት።
msItem.note: On f. 27r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በብዙኃን፡.

msItem.title: Homily for the feast of John the Evangelist by Cyril of Alexandria
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘቄርሎስ፡ ሊቀ፡ ጳጳሳት፡ ዘእልስክንድርያ፡ በበዓለ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ ወንጌላዊ፡ ዘደረሰ፡ በይእቲ፡ ዕለት፡ በቅድመ፡ ኵሉ፡ ጉባኤ።
msItem.note: On f. 33v in the upper margin a note indicating the reading ዘደቂቀ፡ ዘብዴዎስ፡.

msItem.title: Anonymous homily for the commemoration of ʾƎlla ʾAṣbǝḥa on the 4th of Ṭǝqǝmt
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ በዕለተ፡ እለ፡ አጽብሓ፡ ዘቅዱሳን፡ ተዝካራተ፡ እለ፡ ይዌድሱ፡ ክብረ፡ ሎሙ፡ ይደልዎሙ፡ በኀበ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ዐስቦሙ፡ ይንሥኡ።
msItem.note: On f. 34v in the upper margin a note indicating the reading እም፡ ረቡዑ፡ ለጥቅምት፡ በተዝካረ፡ እለ፡ አጽብሓ፡.

msItem.title: Homily on the commemoration of ʾabbā Yoḥanni
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘብፁዕ፡ ወቅዱስ፡ ሚናስ፡ ኤጲስ፡ ቆጶስ፡ ዘአክሱም፡ ዘደረሰ፡ በእንተ፡ ብፁዕ፡ ወቅዱስ፡ አባ፡ ዮሐኒ።
msItem.note: On f. 35v in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በአባ፡ ዮሐኒ፡.

msItem.title: Homily by "Orthodox" on the two Sabbaths
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ በእንተ፡ ሰንበታት፡ ዘደረሰ፡ ርቱዐ፡ ሃይማኖት፡ ለመእመናን፡ ሕዝብ።
msItem.note: On f. 37v in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በሰንበተ፡ ክርስቲያን፡.

msItem.title: Encomium for the commemoration of the Four Living Creatures on the 8th of Ḫǝdār
msItem.incipit: ውዳሴ፡ ዘይቤ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ወክቡር፡ አባ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ በኵሉ፡ ግብሩ፡ ዘኮነ፡ ማኅደረ፡ ለመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ሊቀ፡ ጳጳሳት፡ ዘቈስጠንጢኖስ፡ ጶሊስ፡ ሀገር፡ በእንተ፡ ዕበዮሙ፡ ለ፬፡ እንስሳ፡
msItem.note: On f. 48v in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በ፬፡ እንስሳ፡.

msItem.title: Homily for the commemoration of the Egyptian martyr Menas
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘቅዱስ፡ ወብፁዕ፡ ድራትዮስ፡ ሊቀ፡ ጳጳሳት፡ በእንተ፡ ብፁዕ፡ ሚናስ፡
msItem.note: On f. 57v in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በሚናስ፡.

msItem.title: Anonymous homily for the commemoration of John the Baptist and the consecration of his church
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘቤተ፡ ክርስቲያን፡ ዘዮሐንስ፡ መፍቀሪተ፡ ገዳም፡ እንተ፡ ውስተ፡ ገዳም፡ ተኀድር፡ ትጼውዕ፡
msItem.note: On f. 60r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading አመ፳፬፡ ለኅዳር፡ ወበቅዳሴ፡ ቤተ፡ ክርስቲያን፡.

msItem.title: Anonymous homily for the commemoration of the Four Living Creatures and the Twenty-Four Elders of Heaven
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘይትነበብ፡ በካህናት፡ ወበ፬፡ እንስሳ፡
msItem.note: On f. 63v in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በ፬፡ እንስሳ፡ ወበካህናተ፡ ሰማይ፡.

msItem.title: Homily for the commemoration of St. Michael on the 12th of Ḫǝdār, by Damātiyās, bishop of Alexandria
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ነገሩ፡ ዘቅዱስ፡ አባ፡ ድማቲያስ፡ ሊቀ፡ ጳጳሳት፡ ዘእልስክንድርያ፡ በበዓለ፡ ሊቀ፡ መላእክት፡ ሚካኤል፡ አመ፡ ፲ወ፪፡ ዕለቱ፡ ለኅዳር።
msItem.note: On f. 69r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading አመ፡ ፲ወ፪፡ ለኅዳር፡.

msItem.title: Anonymous homily for the commemoration of the Twenty-Four Elders of Heaven
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘ፳ወ፬፡ ካህናተ፡ ሰማይ፡ ዐቀብተ፡ ሥራይ፡ እሙንቱ፡ ካህናት፡ ለድውያን፡ ሕዝብ፡ ወፈውሳነ፡ ቍስሎሙ፡ ለእለ፡ የሐሙ፡ ወይትሀወኩ፡ በነገሮሙ፡ ለዕልዋነ፡ ሃይማኖት፡
msItem.note: On f. 73r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በካህናተ፡ ሰማይ፡.

msItem.title: Anonymous homily for the commemoration of St. Peter, Patriarch of Alexandria, and St. Mark
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘጴጥሮስ፡ ወማርቆስ፡ ወንጌላዊ፡ ነገረ፡ ስኒዶስ፡ ዘሕግ፡ ከመዝ።
msItem.note: On f. 79r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በጴጥሮስ፡ ወበማርቆስ፡.

msItem.title: Homily by ʾabbā Yāʿeqob on the Annunciation and on Sts. Mary and Elizabeth
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘአባ፡ ያዕቆብ፡ በስብከተ፡ ጌና፡ ዘበእንተ፡ ማርያም፡ ወኤልሳቤጥ፡
msItem.note: On f. 80v in the upper margin a note indicating the reading ዘስብከተ፡ ጌና፡.

msItem.title: Homily by ʾabbā Yāʿeqob on the Annunciation and on Sts. Mary and Elizabeth
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘአባ፡ ያዕቆብ፡ ዘብርሃን፡
msItem.note: On f. 82r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading ዘብርሃን፡.

msItem.title: Anonymous homily for the commemoration of Frumentius, for the 18th of Tāḫśāś, the day on which he died, according to this homily
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘቅዱስ፡ ወብፁዕ፡ ፍርማጦስ፡ ኤጲስ፡ ቆጶስ፡ ዘአልሱም፡
msItem.note: On f. 84v in the upper margin a note indicating the reading ዘአባ፡ ሰላማ፡.

msItem.title: Homily on the angels, the divinity and faith, for the commemoration of St. Gabriel on the 19th of Tāḫśāś
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘባስልዮስ፡ ኤጲስ፡ ቆጶስ፡ ርቱዐ፡ ሃይማኖት፡ በእንተ፡ መላእክት፡ ወመለኮት፡ ወበእንተ፡ ሃይማኖት።
msItem.note: On f. 86r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በገብሬል፡.

msItem.title: Homily by ʾabbā Yāʿǝqob on St. Mary and Joseph, for a Sunday in Advent
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘአባ፡ ያዕቆብ፡ ወተመይጠት፡ ማርያም፡ ትግባእ፡ ቤታ፡ እምድኅረ፡ ዝንቱ፡ እስመ፡ በጽሐ፡ ጊዜ፡ ትለድ፡ ወለተ፡ ሌዋዊያን፡
msItem.note: On f. 88r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading ዘኖላዊ፡.

msItem.title: Homily by "Orthodox" for the Nativity
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ በበዓለ፡ ጌና፡ ቅድስት፡ እንተ፡ ይእቲ፡ ልደቱ፡ ለመድኀኒነ፡ ኢየሱስ፡ ክርስቶስ፡ ዘደረሰ፡ ርቱዐ፡ ሃይማኖት፡
msItem.note: On f. 90v in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በዕለተ፡ ጌና፡.

msItem.title: Homily for the 19th of Naḥase, for feasts of St. Mary and on Christmas day, by Proclus of Cyzicus
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘጵርቀልሎስ፡ ጳጳስ፡ ዘሀገረ፡ ቂዝቆስ፡ ዘደረሰ፡ በቈስጠንጢኑ፡ ጶሊስ፡ በበዓለ፡ ጌና፡ በእንተ፡ ትስብእቱ፡ ለእግዚእነ፡ ኢየሱስ፡ ክርስቶስ፡
msItem.note: On f. 96v in the upper margin a note indicating the reading አመ፡ ፲፱፡ ለነሐሲ፡ በዐለ፡ ማርያም፡ ወበዕለተ፡ ጌና፡.

msItem.title: Homily on the Nativity, to be read on the day after Christmas, by Tewoflos, bishop of ʾAksum
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘበዓለ፡ ጌና፡ ቴዎፍሎስ፡ ኤጲስ፡ ቆጶስ፡ ዘአክሱም፡
msItem.note: On f. 100r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በሳኒታ፡ ጌና፡.

msItem.title: Homily by ʾabbā Yāʿǝqob, the Orthodox, on the Nativity, to be read on the commemoration of the Holy Innocents
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘርቱዐ፡ ሃይማኖት፡ ዘአባ፡ ያዕቆብ፡ ዘደረሰ፡ በእንተ፡ ልደቱ፡ ለእግዚእነ፡ ኢየሱስ፡ ክርስቶስ፡
msItem.note: Onf. 102r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በሕፃናት፡.

msItem.title: Homily by the "Orthodox" on St. Stephen, for his commemoration
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘርቱዐ፡ ሃይማኖት፡ ዘደረሰ፡ በእንተ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ወብፁዕ፡ ሰማዕት፡ እስጢፋኖስ፡ ቀዳሚ፡ ሰማዕት፡
msItem.note: Onf. 106r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በእስጢፋኖስ፡.

msItem.title: Homily for the commemoration of ʾabbā Maṭāʿ (or Libānos) by ʾElyās, bishop of ʾAksum
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘብፁዕ፡ ኤጲስ፡ ቆጶስ፡ አባ፡ ኤልያስ፡ ዘደረሰ፡ በእንተ፡ ብፁዕ፡ መነኮስ፡ አባ፡ መጣዕ፡ ዘውእቱ፡ ሊባኖስ፡ ብእሴ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡
msItem.note: Onf. 110r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በአባ፡ መጣዕ፡.

msItem.title: Thirteen anathemas by "the twelve bishops," which they composed after the excommunication of Nestorius at the Council of Ephesus
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘደረሱ፡ ፲ወ፪፡ ኤጲስ፡ ቆጶሳት፡ መትሎ፡ ሥርዐት፡ ዘተጽሐፈ፡ እምድኅረ፡ ስዕረቱ፡ ለንስጥሮስ፡ ዘደረሱ፡ ኤጲስ፡ ቆጶሳት፡ ርቱዓነ፡ ሃይማኖት፡
msItem.note: Onf. 113v in the upper margin a note indicating the reading እም፲፡ ለጥር፡.

msItem.title: Homily by the "Orthodox", who did not indicate his name out of modesty, on the Incarnation, to be read on the feast of the Epiphany
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘኢጲፋንያ፡ በእንተ፡ አስተርእዮቱ፡ ለክርስቶስ፡ በሥጋ፡ ሰብእ፡ ዘደረሰ፡ ርቱዐ፡ ሃይማኖት፡
msItem.note: Onf. 114v in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በዕለተ፡ ኤጰፋንያ፡.

msItem.title: Homily for the Sunday of Cana of Galilee or Epiphany by Tewoflos, bishop of ʾAksum
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘበዓለ፡ ኤጰፋንያ፡ ዘቴዎፍሎስ፡ ኤጲስ፡ ቆጶስ፡ ዘአክሱም፡
msItem.note: Onf. 121v in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በቃና፡ ዘገሊላ፡.

msItem.title: Homily on the Incarnation of the Word, to be read on the third (Sunday?) of Epiphany, by Athanasius of Alexandria
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ በጥልቀተ፡ ኤጰፋንያ፡ ዘአትናስዮስ፡ ሊቀ፡ ጳጳሳት፡ ዘእልስክንድርያ፡ በእንተ፡ ተሠግዎቱ፡ ለእግዚአብሔር፡ ቃል፡
msItem.note: Onf. 123r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በ፫፡ ኤጰፋንያ፡.

msItem.title: Homily on the Dormition of the Virgin Mary, by Minās, bishop of ʾAksum
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘቅዱስ፡ ወብፁዕ፡ ሚናስ፡ ኤጲስ፡ ቆጶስ፡ ዘአክሱም፡ በእንተ፡ ቅድስት፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ፡ ድንግል፡ ማርያም፡
msItem.note: Onf. 124v in the upper margin a note indicating the reading አመ፡ ፳፬፡ ለወርኀ፡ ጥር፡ ተዝካረ፡ ዕረፍታ፡ ለማርያም፡.

msItem.title: Homily on how Simeon carried Jesus in his arms, by Philoxenus of Mabbug
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘቅዱስ፡ ወብፁዕ፡ ፍልክሲኖስ፡ ዘሀገረ፡ ምንብግ፡ ጳጳስ፡ በእንተ፡ ዘተወክፎ፡ ስምዖን፡ አረጋዊ፡ ለኢየሱስ፡ ውስተ፡ ሕፅኑ፡
msItem.note: Onf. 129r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading አመ፡ ፰፡ ለየካቲት፡ በስምዖን፡.

msItem.title: Homily by John on almsgiving, for the Saturday immediately before the fast of Lent
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘዚአሁ፡ ለዮሐንስ፡ በእንተ፡ ምጽዋት፡
msItem.note: Onf. 133r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በሰንበተ፡ አይሁድ፡ ቅድመ፡ ድራረ፡ ጾም፡.

msItem.title: Homily on fasting, for the Sunday (before Lent), by bishop Tewoflos
msItem.incipit: ቃለ፡ ተግሣጽ፡ ዘደረሰ፡ ብፁዕ፡ ቴዎፍሎስ፡ ኤጲስ፡ ቆጶስ፡ በእንተ፡ ጾም፡
msItem.note: Onf. 134v in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በዕለተ፡ ሰንበተ፡ ክርስቲያን፡.

msItem.title: Homily by John on fasting, for the Sunday (before Lent)
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘዚአሁ፡ ለዮሐንስ፡ በእንተ፡ ጾም፡
msItem.note: Onf. 134v in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በዕለተ፡ ሰንበተ፡ ክርስቲያን፡.

msItem.title: Homily for the first Saturday of Lent by John Chrysostom
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘዮሐንስ፡ አፈ፡ ወርቅ፡ ዘይትነበብ፡ በቀዳማይ፡ ሰንበተ፡ ጾም፡
msItem.note: Onf. 138v in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በቀዳማይ፡ ሰንበተ፡ አይሁድ፡.

msItem.title: Homily by the "Orthodox" for Sunday during Lent
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘቅድስት፡ ጾመ፡ ፋስካ፡ ዘደረሰ፡ ርቱዐ፡ ሃይማኖት፡ ለሕንጻ፡ ማእመናን፡
msItem.note: Onf. 139v in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በዕለተ፡ ሰንበተ፡ ክርስቲያን፡.
On f. 143v the second part of the homily is separated from the first by a sign composed of letters ቍ and ም. The second part has indication for reading: በካዕብ፡ ሰንበረ፡ አይሁድ፡

msItem.title: Homily for the second Sunday in Lent by Ephrem
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ በካዕብ፡ ሰንበተ፡ ጾም፡ ዘደረሰ፡ አባ፡ ኤፍሬም፡
msItem.note: Onf. 148v in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በካዕብ፡ ሰንበተ፡ ጾም፡.

msItem.title: Anonymous homily for the third Saturday in Lent
msItem.incipit: በሣልስ፡ ሰንበተ፡ አይሁድ፡ ድርሳን፡ ሶበ፡ ንትዌፈይ፡ ጾመ፡ በሣልስ፡ ሰንበት፡ በእንተ፡ ዘይቤ፡ በወንጌል፡
msItem.note: Onf. 152v in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በሣልስ፡ ሰንበተ፡ አይሁድ፡.

msItem.title: Anonymous homily for the third Sunday in Lent
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ በእንተ፡ ጾም፡
msItem.note: Onf. 154r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በሣልስ፡ ሰንበተ፡ ክርስቲያን፡.
On f. 155r-155v 33 lines of text have been erased.

msItem.title: Homily by ʾabbā Yāʿǝqob for the third Sunday in Lent
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘአባ፡ ያዕቆብ፡ ዘሣልስ፡ ሰንበተ፡ ክርስቲያን፡
msItem.note: Onf. 157r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በሣልስ፡ ሰንበተ፡ ክርስቲያን፡.

msItem.title: Homily for the fourth Saturday in Lent, by John Chrystostom
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘዮሐንስ፡ አፈ፡ ወርቅ፡ ዘይትነበብ፡ በራብ፡ ሰንበተ፡ ዘጾም፡
msItem.note: Onf. 161r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በራብዕ፡ ሰንበተ፡ አይሁድ፡.

msItem.title: Homily by the "Orthodox" on fasting
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘርቱዐ፡ ሃይማኖት፡ ዘበእንተ፡ ጾም፡
msItem.note: Onf. 162r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በራብዕ፡ ሰንበተ፡ ጾም፡.

msItem.title: Anonymous homily on the Holy Cross in which the story of the finding of the Cross is related
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘቅዱስ፡ መስቀል፡ ዘኀሠሠት፡ እሌኒ፡ ንግሥት፡ በመዋዕለ፡ ዖዝያን፡ ንጉሥ፡ ዝንቱ፡ ድርሳን፡ ዘይትነበብ፡ በበዓለ፡ መስቀል፡
msItem.note: Onf. 164r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading አመ፡ ፲፡ ለመጋቢት፡ ይትነበብ፡.

msItem.title: Anonymous homily on the Holy Cross in which the story of the finding of the Cross is related
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘቅዱስ፡ መስቀል፡ ዘኀሠሠት፡ እሌኒ፡ ንግሥት፡ በመዋዕለ፡ ዖዝያን፡ ንጉሥ፡ ዝንቱ፡ ድርሳን፡ ዘይትነበብ፡ በበዓለ፡ መስቀል፡
msItem.note: Onf. 164r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading አመ፡ ፲፡ ለመጋቢት፡ ይትነበብ፡.

msItem.title: Homily on the Holy Cross, by John the bishop
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘዮሐንስ፡ ኤጲስ፡ ቆጶስ፡ ዘደረሰ፡ በእንተ፡ ቅዱስ፡ መስቀል፡ ለክርስቶስ፡
msItem.note: Onf. 167r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading እም፲፪፡ በመስቀል፡ ዘጾም፡.

msItem.title: Anonymous homily for the Holy Cross during Lent
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘይትነበብ፡ በመስቀል፡ ዘጾም፡ በእንተ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ዕፀ፡ መስቀል፡ ዘክርስቶስ፡
msItem.note: Onf. 169v in the upper margin a note indicating the reading እም፳፮፡ ለመጋቢት፡.

msItem.title: Homily by John Chrysosthon, for the fifth Sunday in Lent
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘዚኣሁ፡ ለዮሐንስ፡ አፈ፡ ወርቅ፡ ዘይትነበብ፡ በኃምስ፡ ሰንበተ፡ ጾም፡
msItem.note: Onf. 171r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በኃምስ፡ ሰንበት፡.

msItem.title: Anonymous homily on Mt. 10, 34-35, for the fifth Sunday in Lent
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ በኃምስ፡ ሰንበተ፡ ጾም፡ ዘእምወንጌል፡ ዘ፺፭፡ ማቴዎስ፡ በእንተ፡ ዘይቤ፡ እግዚእነ፡ ኢመጻእኩ፡ ሰላመ፡ እደይ፡ ለብሔር፡ አላ፡ መጥባሕተ፡
msItem.note: Onf. 172r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በኃምስ፡ ሰንበት፡.

msItem.title: Homily on the Prodigal Son (Lk. 15, 11-32), for the fifth Sunday in Lent
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘጎርጎርዮስ፡ ቀሲስ፡ ዘአንጾኪያ፡ በእንተ፡ ምሳሉ፡ ውስተ፡ ወንጌል፡ በእንተ፡ ዘሐርተመ፡ ወልድ፡
msItem.note: Onf. 173v in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በኃምስ፡ ሰንበተ፡ ክርስቲያን፡.
On f. 176v the second part of the homily is separated from the first by a sign composed of letters ቍ and ም. The second part has indication for reading: በሳድስ፡ ዓርብ፡

msItem.title: Anonymous homily on Mt. 11, 28, for the sixth Saturday in Lent
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ በእንተ፡ ዘይቤ፡ ውስተ፡ ወንጌል፡ ንዑ፡ ኀቤየ፡ ሥሩሓን፡ ወክቡዳን፡ ወአነ፡ አዐረፈክሙ፡
msItem.note: Onf. 179r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በሳድስ፡ ሰንበተ፡ አይሁድ፡.

msItem.title: Homily by ʾabbā Yāʿǝqob, for the sixth Sunday in Lent
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘአባ፡ ያዕቆብ፡ ዘይትነበብ፡ በሳድስ፡ ሰንበተ፡ ጾም፡
msItem.note: Onf. 179v in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በሳድስ፡ ሰንበተ፡ ክርስቲያን፡.

msItem.title: Homily by the "Orthodox", for Palm Sunday
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘርቱዐ፡ ሃይማኖት፡ ዘደረሰ፡ በመዋዕለ፡ አጽዋም፡
msItem.note: Onf. 182r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በሆሳዕና፡.

msItem.title: Homily by St. Ephrem, for Maundy Thursday
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘአባ፡ ኤፍሬም፡ ዘይትነበብ፡ በጸሎተ፡ ኀሙስ፡
msItem.note: Onf. 184v in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በጸሎተ፡ ኀሙስ፡.

msItem.title: Anonymous homily, for Maundy Thursday
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ በጸሎተ፡ ኀሙስ፡
msItem.note: Onf. 187r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በጸሎተ፡ ኀሙስ፡ ፪.

msItem.title: Homily for Easter Eve, by St. Ephrem
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘመኃትወ፡ ፋሲካ፡ ዘዚኣሁ፡ ለአባ፡ ኤፍሬም፡
msItem.note: Onf. 188v in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በመኃትወ፡ ፋሲካ፡.

msItem.title: Homily by the "Orthodox", for Easter
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘበዓለ፡ ፋሲካ፡ ዘደረሰ፡ ርቱዐ፡ ሃይማኖት፡
msItem.note: Onf. 190r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በዕለተ፡ ፋሲካ፡.
On f. 195v the second part of the homily is separated from the first by a sign composed of letters ቍ and ም. The second part has indication for reading: በሰኑየ፡ ፋሲካ፡

msItem.title: Homily on the Apostles and on the thief on the right hand, for Easter Tuesday, by ʾabbā Tewoflos
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘብፁዕ፡ አባ፡ ቴዎፍሎስ፡ ዘበእንተ፡ ሐዋርያት፡ ወበእንተ፡ ፈያታዊ፡ ዘየማን፡
msItem.note: Onf. 199r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በሠሉሰ፡ ፋሲካ፡.

msItem.title: Homily for Easter Wednesday, by Felon, Bishop of Qerpesyās
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘፌሎን፡ ኤጲስ፡ ቆጶስ፡ ዘብሔረ፡ ቄርጴስያስ፡ ድርሳን፡ በእንተ፡ በዓለ፡ ፋሲካ፡
msItem.note: Onf. 201v in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በረቡዐ፡ ፋሲካ፡.

msItem.title: Homily on Mt. 26, 39, by John, Bishop of Constantinople
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘዮሐንስ፡ ኤጲስ፡ ቆጶስ፡ ዘቈስጠንጢኖስ፡ ጶሊስ፡ በእንተ፡ ዘይቤ፡ እግዚእነ፡ ኢየሱስ፡ ክርስቶስ፡ ለእመ፡ ይትከሀል፡ ይኅልፍ፡ ዝንቱ፡ ጸዋዕ፡
msItem.note: Onf. 204v in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በኀሙስ፡ ፋሲካ፡.

msItem.title: Homily for the sixth (day) in Easter Week, by Epiphanius, Bishop of Cyprus
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘኤጲፋኒስ፡ ጳጳስ፡ ዘሀገረ፡ ቄጵሮስ፡ በእንተ፡ ሃይማኖት፡ ዘንጽሕት፡ ርግብ፡ ወቅድስት፡ ድንግል፡ ዘይእቲ፡ ቤተ፡ ክርስቲያን፡
msItem.note: Onf. 209r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በ፮፡ ፋሲካ፡.

msItem.title: Homily on Easter, for the seventh (day) of Easter Week, by Tewoflos, bishop of ʾAksum
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘቅዱስ፡ ወብፁዕ፡ ኤጲስ፡ ቆጶስ፡ ቴዎፍሎስ፡ ዘአክሱም፡ በእንተ፡ በዓለ፡ ፋሲካ፡
msItem.note: Onf. 212v in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በ፯፡ ፋሲካ፡.

msItem.title: Homily for the end of Easter Week, by Tewoflos, bishop of ʾAksum
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘብፁዕ፡ ወቅዱስ፡ ቴዎፍሎስ፡ ኤጲስ፡ ቆጶስ፡ ዘአክሱም፡ ዘሰሙነ፡ ፋሲካ፡
msItem.note: Onf. 216r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በጥልቀተ፡ ፋሲካ፡.

msItem.title: Homily for the commemoration of St. George, on the 23rd of Miyāzyā, by John, metropolitan of Ethiopia
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘብፁዕ፡ ወቅዱስ፡ አባ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ ጳጳስ፡ ዘኢትዮጵያ፡ በሰላመ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ አሜን፡
msItem.note: Onf. 218r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading ዘጊዮርጊስ፡ እም፳፫፡ ለሚያዝያ፡.

msItem.title: Martyrdom of St. Mark the Evangelist, for the commemoration of St. Mark
msItem.incipit: ገድል፡ ወስምዕ፡ ዘቅዱስ፡ ማርቆስ፡ ወንጌላዊ፡
msItem.note: Onf. 224r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በማርቆስ፡.

msItem.title: Homily for the midpoint of the Easter season by Tewoflos
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘቅዱስ፡ ቴዎፍሎስ፡ በመንፈቀ፡ ኀምሳ፡
msItem.note: Onf. 227r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በረክብ፡.

msItem.title: Anonymous homily for the midpoint of the Easter season and "the coucil of the Priests"
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘበእንተ፡ ቅድስት፡ ረክብ፡ ወጉባኤ፡ ካህናት፡
msItem.note: Onf. 230r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በረክብ፡.

msItem.title: Homily on St. Mary, for her Nativity, by John, metropolitan of Ethiopia
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘቅድስት፡ ማርያም፡ ድንግል፡ እሙ፡ ለእግዚእነ፡ ዘደረሰ፡ አባ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ ጳጳስ፡ ዘኢትዮጵያ፡
msItem.note: Onf. 233v in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በወርኅ፡ ግንቦት፡ እም፩፡ ልደታ፡ ለማርያም፡ ይትነበብ፡.

msItem.title: Homily by the "Orthodox" for the Ascension
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ በዓለ፡ አርብዓ፡ እንተ፡ ይእቲ፡ ዕርገቱ፡ ለኢየሱስ፡ ክርስቶስ፡ ውስተ፡ ሰማይ፡ ወንብረቱ፡ በየማነ፡ አብ፡ መልዕልተ፡ ኵሉ፡ ስም፡ ዘይሰመይ፡ ዘደረሰ፡ ርቱዐ፡ ሃይማኖት፡
msItem.note: Onf. 240v in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በበዓለ፡ አርብዓ፡.

msItem.title: Homily for the Sunday after the Ascension, by Tewoflos, bishop of ʾAksum
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘቅዱስ፡ ወብፁዕ፡ ቴዎፍሎስ፡ ኤጲስ፡ ቆጶስ፡ ዘአክሱም፡ ዘደረሰ፡ በበዓለ፡ አርብዓ፡
msItem.note: Onf. 245v in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በሰንበት፡ ድኅረ፡ በዓለ፡ ፵፡.

msItem.title: Homily by the "Orthodox", for Pentecost
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘደረሰ፡ ርቱዐ፡ ሃይማኖት፡ ለርቱዓነ፡ ሃይማኖት፡ ሕዝብ፡ በበዓለ፡ ኀምሳ፡ ይትነበብ፡
msItem.note: Onf. 247r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በበዓለ፡ ኀምሳ፡.
On f. 253v the second part of the homily is separated from the first by a sign composed of letters ቍ and ም. The second part has indication for reading: በሰንበት፡ ድኅረ፡ በዓለ፡ ፶፡ ይትነበብ፡

msItem.title: Homily, to be read on the commemoration of ʾabbā Garimā, by Lulyānos, bishop of Axum
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘብፁዐ፡ ወቅዱስ፡ ኤጲስ፡ ቆጶስ፡ ሉልያኖስ፡ ዘአክሱም፡ ዘበእንተ፡ አበው፡ ቅዱሳን፡
msItem.note: Onf. 258r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በአባ፡ ገሪማ፡.

supportDesc.condition: Ff 3a-6b and 279a-280a has been cut off. Part of the text on ff.57a and 155ab has been erased by the copyist. There may be several leaves missing after f.132, as the readings for the Fast now follow immediately the reading for the 8th of Yakkātit.

decoNote.desc: Decorations of different sizes are found on ff. 133a, 138b and 139b.

history.provenance: Colophon indicates that the ms was copied by Marqoreyos for Aqqābē Sa'āt Bakkimos, who donated it to the Monastery of Hayq Estifānos. In Monastery of Ḥayq Esṭifānos when filmed.

projectDesc.p: Encoded according to TEI P5 Guidelines.

revisionDesc.change: Created minimal record with link from data sent from Daniel Gullo, HMML project.
